sense.def:
Kadar človek
picks a particular person or thing
, se odloči za določeno osebo ali stvar.

seg.quote: Next time let's pick somebody else.
I could not have picked a better way to travel.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
picks flowers, fruit, or leaves
, rože, sadje ali liste odtrga od rastline in nabere po več skupaj.

Kadar človek
picks something from a place
ali
picks something up
, tisto s prsti odstrani od tam, kjer je bilo.

seg.quote: He picked his blazer off a chair.
She picked a cigarette from her box and lit it.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
picks an argument with someone
, namerno sproži prepir z nekom.

seg.quote: He had ceased to pick quarrels with her.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
picks a lock
, ključavnico odpre brez ključa, na primer s koščkom žice.

Kadar človek
picks his way across an area
, gre previdno prek tistega območja in se izogiba oviram.

seg.quote: He began to pick his way over the rocks.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
picks at the food
, jé zelo majhne grižljaje hrane.

seg.quote: Laing was picking morosely at his salad.
Why are you always picking on me?

sense.def:
Kadar človek
picks out someone or something
, nekoga ali nekaj prepozna, čeprav je tisto osebo ali stvar težko videti.

seg.quote: Ralph picked out Jack easily, even at that distance.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
picks something up
, tisto stvar dvigne s tal.

seg.quote: He stooped down to pick up the two pebbles.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
picks up something or someone
, gre nekaj ali nekoga nekam iskat.

seg.quote: I might get my brother to come and pick me up.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
is picked up
, ga policija aretira.

seg.quote: I don't want you to be picked up for drunkenness.
Did you pick up any Swedish?
I may pick up a couple of useful ideas for my book.
I doubt whether Tony ever picked up a woman in his life.

sense.def:
Kadar naprava
picks up a signal or sound
, sprejema ali odkrije signal ali zvok.

seg.quote: It was easier to pick up Radio Luxembourg than the Light Programme.

sense.def:
Kadar gospodarstvo države
picks up
, se njegovo stanje izboljša.
